title: WE NEED A BATTLE CAST VOLI BEAR!!!!
body: I think Battle cast voli bear would be awesome if there are any creative ppl out there they should draw/design concept and pitch to riot Would be the best skin in LOL i reckon thoughts on skins for voli anyone ???{{champion:106}}

replies.body: 1. Name all the current Battlecast skins.  2. What do they all have in common?
